> Can I make Heritrix3 produce arc files instead of warc files?

Yes you=
 can. Simply replace the WARCWriterProcessor with the ARCWriterProcessor in=
 the crawler-beans.cxml file.

E.g. replace the line:

<bean id=3D"warcWrit=
er" class=3D"org.archive.modules.writer.WARCWriterProcessor">

with 

<bean=
 id=3D"warcWriter" class=3D"org.archive.modules.writer.ARCWriterProcessor">=


The bean "id" is purely for internal wiring, but if you change it as well=
, make sure to change all instances of "warcWriter" in you cxml file.

Note=
 also, that while the two processors share many properties, they are not id=
entical. Notably the following WARCWriterProcessor properties are included =
(commented out) in the default profile and will not work for the ARCWriterP=
rocessor.
<!-- <property name=3D"writeRequests" value=3D"true" /> -->
<!-- =
<property name=3D"writeMetadata" value=3D"true" /> -->
<!-- <property name=
=3D"writeRevisitForIdenticalDigests" value=3D"true" /> -->
<!-- <property n=
ame=3D"writeRevisitForNotModified" value=3D"true" /> -->

- Kris
